nodes.text: Thabeska was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories where the Fardi clan operated. It was windy and dusty, and newcomers to the planet could be identified by having clean, dust-free clothing. After surviving Order 66, former Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano spent the first year of the Imperial Era in hiding on Thabeska, working for the Fardis as a mechanic.
